perturbation.original_text: 1.10 "Incorporated Technology Works" shall mean all inventions, intellectual property, works, derivative works, innovations, or other developments made or developed by Wildform solely as a result of and in relation to the incorporation of the Incorporated Technology to the Flix Software, and explicitly excluding the Licensed Assets. 1.11 "Nonconformance Notice" shall have the meaning set forth in Section 3.1 hereof. 1.12 "Payment Shares" means Two Hundred Eighty Thousand shares of Common Stock, subject to adjustment from time to time in connection with any stock split, reverse stock split, stock dividend or other similar change in On2's capitalization.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.10 "Incorporated Technology Works" shall mean all inventions, intellectual property, works, derivative works, innovations, or other developments made or developed by Wildform solely as a result of and in relation to the incorporation of the Incorporated Technology to the Flix Software, and explicitly including the Licensed Assets. 1.11 "Nonconformance Notice" shall have the meaning set forth in Section 3.1 hereof. 1.12 "Payment Shares" refers to shares of Common Stock determined at the discretion of On2, not necessarily Two Hundred Eighty Thousand.
perturbation.explanation: The original text explicitly excludes "Licensed Assets" from "Incorporated Technology Works," while the modified text includes them. Also the term 'means Two Hundred Eighty Thousand shares of Common Stock' is changed to 'refers to shares of Common Stock determined at the discretion of On2, not necessarily Two Hundred Eighty Thousand.' This creates uncertainty about what constitutes "Incorporated Technology Works" and number of 'Payment Shares'.

perturbation.original_text: 5.3 Receiving Party's Duty of Care. Receiving Party shall protect the Confidential Information from unauthorized use or disclosure by exercising the same degree of care that Receiving Party uses with respect to information of its own of a similar nature, but in no event less than reasonable care, until five (5) years from the later of the Effective Date or the date of receipt of such Confidential Information. Notwithstanding the prior sentence, with respect to Receiving Party's employees, Receiving Party shall only disclose Confidential Information to a Receiving Party employee who has a need to know such Confidential Information for purposes of this Agreement or any customer sublicense and is informed of the confidential nature of the Confidential Information.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.3 Receiving Party's Duty of Care. Receiving Party may, at its convenience, protect the Confidential Information from unauthorized use or disclosure, or otherwise handle it as Receiving Party sees fit. Notwithstanding the prior sentence, Receiving Party's employees may disclose Confidential Information to anyone within or outside the company. The employees are under no restrictions.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly mandates a duty of care for protecting confidential information, while the modified text eliminates the duty and permits disclosure. This directly contradicts the intended purpose of a confidentiality clause and creates uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: 3.1 Deliverables. Subject to payment by On2 of the Closing Date Payment Amount in accordance with the Asset Purchase Agreement, Wildform shall deliver each Deliverable in accordance with the timeframe (the "Timeframe") set forth in Exhibit B, which Exhibit is made a part of this Agreement. On2 will use commercially reasonable efforts to cooperate with Wildform as necessary in completing the Development Work and delivery of the Deliverables. Upon receipt of each Deliverable, On2 shall have a period of thirty (30) working days within which to inspect such Deliverable based upon the relevant Specification (an "Acceptance Period").
perturbation.changed_text: 3.1 Deliverables. Wildform may choose to deliver some or none of the deliverable, and their timeline of delivery is to be determined by Wildform. On2 will not use commercially reasonable efforts to cooperate with Wildform as necessary in completing the Development Work and delivery of the Deliverables. Upon receipt of each Deliverable, On2's acceptance is implied, with no inspection period.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that "Wildform shall deliver each Deliverable in accordance with the timeframe (the "Timeframe") set forth in Exhibit B", whereas the modified version states that "Wildform may choose to deliver some or none of the deliverable, and their timeline of delivery is to be determined by Wildform." This creates uncertainty regarding the fulfillment of the contract's core obligations.
